  • Blunder Punisher

  • About Us

Our Mission

SquareChess aims to elevate chess skills through innovative tools and resources, making high-level chess preparation accessible to everyone.

We cater to chess enthusiasts, students, and professionals looking to improve their game, promoting excellence, innovation, and accessibility.

Fabiano Caruana

COO/Co-Founder

Julian Zapata-Hall

CEO/Co-Founder

Fabiano Caruana - COO/Founder

Fabiano Caruana is a world-renowned chess grandmaster with numerous accolades, including his victory at the 2014 Sinquefield Cup, where he achieved an extraordinary seven-game winning streak. His contributions to the chess world are immense, and his passion for the game has led him to found SquareChess, where he aims to share his knowledge and innovative techniques with chess enthusiasts worldwide. Fabiano's vision for SquareChess is to create a platform that not only teaches but also inspires and prepares players for the highest levels of competition.

© 2024 SquareChess.org All rights reserved.
